00082    void PairPotential::readPairListParam(std::istream& in)
00083    {
00084       read<double>(in, "skin", skin_);
00085       read<int>(in, "pairCapacity", pairCapacity_);
00086       read<Boundary>(in, "maxBoundary", maxBoundary_);
00087       cutoff_ = maxPairCutoff() + skin_;
00088 
00089       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00090          boundary() = maxBoundary_;
00091          //boundary().setOrthorhombic(maxBoundary_.lengths());
00092          // Above is necessary because the domain uses a reference to the
00093          // boundary to calculate domain bounds, if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL).
00094       }
00095 
00096       // Set cutoffs, and upper and lower bound of the processor domain.
00097       Vector lower;
00098       Vector upper;
00099       Vector cutoffs;
00100       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00101          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00102          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00103          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00104             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_;
00105          } else {
00106             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_/maxBoundary_.length(i);
00107          }
00108       }
00109 
00110       // Allocate CellList and PairList
00111       int localCapacity = storage().atomCapacity();
00112       int totalCapacity = localCapacity + storage().ghostCapacity();
00113       cellList_.allocate(totalCapacity, lower, upper, cutoffs);
00114       pairList_.allocate(localCapacity, pairCapacity_, cutoff_);
00115    }
00116 
00117    /*
00118    * Allocate memory for the cell list.
00119    */
00120    void PairPotential::initialize(const Boundary& maxBoundary, double skin, 
00121                                   int pairCapacity)
00122    {
00123       skin_ = skin;
00124       pairCapacity_ = pairCapacity;
00125       cutoff_ = maxPairCutoff() + skin;
00126       maxBoundary_ = maxBoundary;
00127 
00128       Vector cutoffs;
00129       Vector lower;
00130       Vector upper;
00131       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00132          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00133          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00134          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00135             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_;
00136          } else {
00137             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_/maxBoundary.length(i);
00138          }
00139       }
00140 
00141       int localCapacity = storage().atomCapacity();
00142       int totalCapacity = localCapacity + storage().ghostCapacity();
00143       cellList_.allocate(totalCapacity, lower, upper, cutoffs);
00144       pairList_.allocate(localCapacity, pairCapacity_, cutoff_);
00145    }
00146 
00147    /*
00148    * Build the cell list.
00149    */
00150    void PairPotential::buildCellList()
00151    {
00152       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00153          if (!storage().isCartesian()) {
00154             UTIL_THROW("Coordinates not Cartesian entering buildCellList");
00155          }
00156       } else {
00157          if (storage().isCartesian()) {
00158             UTIL_THROW("Coordinates are Cartesian entering buildCellList");
00159          }
00160       }
00161 
00162       // Set cutoff and domain bounds.
00163       Vector cutoffs;
00164       Vector lower;
00165       Vector upper;
00166       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00167          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00168             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_;
00169          } else {
00170             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_/boundaryPtr_->length(i);
00171          }
00172          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00173          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00174       }
00175       cellList_.makeGrid(lower, upper, cutoffs);
00176       cellList_.clear();
00177      
00178       // Add all atoms to the cell list. 
00179       AtomIterator atomIter;
00180       storage().begin(atomIter);
00181       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00182          cellList_.placeAtom(*atomIter);
00183       }
00184 
00185       // Add all ghosts to the cell list. 
00186       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00187       storage().begin(ghostIter);
00188       for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00189          cellList_.placeAtom(*ghostIter);
00190       }
00191 
00192       // Finalize cell list
00193       cellList_.build();
00194 
00195       // Postconditions
00196       assert(cellList_.isValid());
00197       assert(cellList_.nAtom() + cellList_.nReject() 
00198              == storage().nAtom() + storage().nGhost());
00199       if (storage().isCartesian()) {
00200          UTIL_THROW("Coordinates are Cartesian exiting buildCellList");
00201       }
00202 
00203    }
00204 
00205    /*
00206    * Build the pair list.
00207    */
00208    void PairPotential::buildPairList()
00209    {
00210       if (!storage().isCartesian()) {
00211          UTIL_THROW("Coordinates not Cartesian entering buildPairList");
00212       }
00213 
00214       pairList_.build(cellList_, reverseUpdateFlag());
00215    }

00218    /*
00219    * Build the cell list (i.e., fill with atoms).
00220    */
00221    void PairPotential::findNeighbors(const Vector& lower, const Vector& upper)
00222    {
00223  
00224       if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00225          if (!storage().isCartesian()) {
00226             UTIL_THROW("Coordinates not Cartesian entering findNeighbors");
00227          }
00228       } else {
00229          if (storage().isCartesian()) {
00230             UTIL_THROW("Coordinates are Cartesian entering findNeighbors");
00231          }
00232       }
00233 
00234       Vector cutoffs;
00235       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00236          if (UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00237             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_;
00238          } else {
00239             cutoffs[i] = cutoff_/boundaryPtr_->length(i);
00240          }
00241       }
00242       cellList_.makeGrid(lower, upper, cutoffs);
00243       cellList_.clear();
00244      
00245       // Add all atoms to the cell list. 
00246       AtomIterator atomIter;
00247       storage().begin(atomIter);
00248       for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00249          cellList_.placeAtom(*atomIter);
00250       }
00251 
00252       // Add all ghosts to the cell list. 
00253       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00254       storage().begin(ghostIter);
00255       for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00256          cellList_.placeAtom(*ghostIter);
00257       }
00258 
00259       cellList_.build();
00260       assert(cellList_.isValid());
00261       assert(cellList_.nAtom() + cellList_.nReject() == storage().nAtom() + storage().nGhost());
00262 
00263       if (!UTIL_ORTHOGONAL) {
00264          storage().transformGenToCart(*boundaryPtr_);
00265       }
00266       pairList_.build(cellList_, reverseUpdateFlag());
00267    }

00269    /*
00270    * Build the cell list (i.e., fill with atoms).
00271    */
00272    void PairPotential::findNeighbors()
00273    {
00274       // Make the cell list grid.
00275       Vector lower;
00276       Vector upper;
00277       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00278          lower[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 0);
00279          upper[i] = domain().domainBound(i, 1);
00280       }
00281       findNeighbors(lower, upper);
00282    }

00285    /*
00286    * Compute total pair nPair on all processors.
00287    */
00288    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00289    void PairPotential::computeNPair(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00290    #else
00291    void PairPotential::computeNPair()
00292    #endif
00293    { 
00294       double cut = maxPairCutoff();
00295       double cutSq = cut*cut;
00296       int localNPair = 0; 
00297       if (methodId() == 0) {
00298          localNPair = nPairList(cutSq); 
00299       } else 
00300       if (methodId() == 1) {
00301          localNPair = nPairCell(cutSq); 
00302       } else {
00303          localNPair = nPairNSq(cutSq); 
00304       }
00305       nPair_ = localNPair;
00306       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00307       communicator.Reduce(&localNPair, &nPair_, 1, MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, 0);
00308       #else
00309       nPair_ = localNPair;
00310       #endif
00311    }
00312 
00319    int PairPotential::nPair() const
00320    {  return nPair_; }
00321 
00322    /*
00323    * Count number pairs using pair list (private).
00324    */
00325    int PairPotential::nPairList(double cutoffSq)
00326    {
00327       Vector f;
00328       double rsq;
00329       PairIterator iter;
00330       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00331       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00332       int count = 0; // atom counter
00333       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00334          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00335             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00336             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00337             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00338             rsq = f.square();
00339             if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00340                count += 2;
00341             }
00342          }
00343       } else {
00344          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00345             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00346             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00347             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00348             rsq = f.square();
00349             if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00350                if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00351                   count += 2;
00352                } else {
00353                   count += 1;
00354                }
00355             }
00356          }
00357       }
00358       return count;
00359    }
00360 
00361    /*
00362    * Count number pairs using cell list (private).
00363    */
00364    int PairPotential::nPairCell(double cutoffSq)
00365    {
00366       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00367       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00368       Vector f;
00369       double rsq;
00370       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00371       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00372       const Cell*  cellPtr;
00373       int na, nn, i, j;
00374       int count = 0;
00375 
00376       // Iterate over linked list of local cells.
00377       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00378       while (cellPtr) {
00379          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors, reverseUpdateFlag());
00380          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00381          nn = neighbors.size();
00382          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00383             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00384 
00385             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00386             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00387                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00388                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00389                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00390                   rsq = f.square();
00391                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00392                      count += 2;
00393                   }
00394                }
00395             }
00396 
00397             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00398             if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00399                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00400                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00401                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00402                   rsq = f.square();
00403                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00404                      count += 2;
00405                   }
00406                }
00407             } else {
00408                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00409                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00410                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00411                   rsq = f.square();
00412                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00413                      if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00414                         count += 2;
00415                      } else {
00416                         count += 1;
00417                      }
00418                   }
00419                }
00420             }
00421 
00422          }
00423          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00424       } // while (cellPtr) 
00425       return count;
00426    }
00427 
00428    /*
00429    * Count pairs using n-squared loop. (private)
00430    */
00431    int PairPotential::nPairNSq(double cutoffSq)
00432    {
00433       Vector f;
00434       double rsq;
00435       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00436       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00437       int id0, id1;
00438       int count = 0;
00439 
00440       // Iterate over local atom 0
00441       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00442       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00443          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00444 
00445          // Iterate over local atom 1
00446          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00447          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00448             id1 = atomIter1->id();
00449             if (id0 < id1) {
00450                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00451                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00452                   rsq = f.square();
00453                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00454                      count += 2;
00455                   }
00456                }
00457             }
00458          }
00459 
00460          // Iterate over ghost atoms
00461          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00462          if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00463             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00464                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00465                if (id0 < id1) {
00466                   if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00467                      f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00468                      rsq = f.square();
00469                      if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00470                         count += 2;
00471                      }
00472                   }
00473                }
00474             }
00475          } else {
00476             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00477                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00478                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00479                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00480                   rsq = f.square();
00481                   if (rsq < cutoffSq) {
00482                      count += 1;
00483                   }
00484                }
00485             }
00486          }
00487 
00488       }
00489       return count;
00490    }
